items.content: I've been appointed as a student member to a University Committee!
Our paper, "Comparing Collaborative Visualization Behaviors in Desktop and Augmented Reality Environments" was accepted for publication in VRST 2023!
I've been appointed as Parliamentarian in the Office of the Assembly President with GPSA. Excited to serve in graduate student government!
Excited to join the JMARS XR team and collaborate with Meteor Studio! I will be collaborating with fellow PhD student Lauren Gold and principal investigator Dr. Robert LiKamWa.

Proud to sign on to an open letter to NSF urging them to reconsider their recent decision to exclude collecting sexual orientation and gender identity information. People must be counted for policy to support them, and the LGBTQ+ scientific workforce needs NSF's support.
I have accepted an appointment as the secondary adviser for oSTEM at ASU! Looking forward to advising the chapter officer team.
My project proposal has been accepted, and I will be serving as a mentor for a Computer Science Senior Capstone team!
I have earned my CompTIA Security+ certification!
I've been accepted into the Computer Science PhD program at Arizona State University, and will be working Dr. Chris Bryan as my mentor!
